author: Gringat
title: Useful little parts pack!
review:
Short review for a small set here, but have to say it's one worth getting for the parts!

Very good value for money compared to many other magazine polybags given it doesn't contain a minifig. Out of those 44 pieces, 7 of them are dark red 1x2 plates. You also get a couple of very useful 1x3 jumper plates, 1x1 brackets, the special studs-with-bar used for the guns, and I've never seen the parts used for the fins in white before: they're the same as the 3x4 stands used in the minifig series. Some useful little slopes too. My only wish is that the studs used on the engines were hollow.

As far as playability goes, the model itself doesn't do much. The guns can tilt. But what more should you expect from a tiny A-Wing? Landing gear (or some single piece to look like landing gear) might have been nice but I would honestly rather keep the red tiles.

Overall a very cute little A-Wing, but much more valuable if you like making custom MOCs!
